column1: Local Foods////The food was just okay.  I was excited about the reviews I had seen here in yelp
column2: and I found the food to not be all that
column3: at least the one dish that I tried.  I had the falafel sandwich with kale and home made fries
column4: and I think the kale was the only good thing (but that's bc I love kale and its nutrition).  The environments was nice and cozy
column5: but my dish and my friends' comments about their food was not that great.  One of them had the vegan chili and said it was delicious
column6: so if I ever go back I will probably eat that.
